plan_description: The Advanced Mobile Postpaid Plan is only 10 Sri Lanka Rupees. You get unlimited browsing, hotspot up to 12 GB and 70 minutes on your Hutch line
The Initial Mobile Postpaid Plan is only 6 Sri Lanka Rupees. You get unlimited browsing, hotspot up to 6 GB and 50 minutes on your Hutch line
The Hutch Initial Plus Plan is 15 Sri Lanka Rupees. It gives you 150 Mbps internet with a WiFi modem, 20 mobile minutes, and unlimited browsing on your phone
Hutch Lite Plus Plan for 8 Sri Lanka Rupees. With that one you get 100 Mbps internet with a WiFi modem, 10 GB of mobile data, and unlimited WhatsApp
